info.title: ScyllaDB Vector Store API
info.description: REST API for ScyllaDB Vector Store nodes. Provides capabilities for executing vector search queries, managing indexes, and checking status of Vector Store nodes.

get.description: Returns the list of indexes managed by the Vector Store node. The list includes indexes in any state (initializing, available/built, destroying). Due to synchronization delays, it may temporarily differ from the list of vector indexes inside ScyllaDB.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns an array of index information representing all indexes managed by the Vector Store.

post.description: Performs an Approximate Nearest Neighbor (ANN) search using the specified index. Returns the vectors most similar to the provided embedding. The maximum number of results is controlled by the optional 'limit' parameter in the payload. The similarity metric is determined at index creation and cannot be changed per query.

parameters.name: keyspace
parameters.description: The name of the ScyllaDB keyspace containing the vector index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The name of the ScyllaDB vector index within the specified keyspace to perform the search on.

200.description: Successful ANN search. Returns a list of primary keys and their corresponding distances for the most similar vectors found.

400.description: Bad request. Possible causes: invalid embedding size, malformed input, or missing required fields.

404.description: Index not found. Possible causes: index does not exist, or is not built yet.

500.description: Error while searching embeddings. Possible causes: internal error, or search engine issues.

503.description: Service Unavailable. Indicates that a full scan of the index is in progress and the search cannot be performed at this time.

get.description: Returns the number of embeddings indexed by a specific vector index. Reflects only available embeddings and excludes any 'tombstones' (elements marked for deletion but still present in the index structure).

parameters.name: keyspace
parameters.description: The name of the ScyllaDB keyspace containing the vector index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The name of the ScyllaDB vector index within the specified keyspace to count embeddings for.

200.description: Successful count operation. Returns the total number of embeddings currently stored in the index.

404.description: Index not found. Possible causes: index does not exist, or is not built yet.

500.description: Error while counting embeddings. Possible causes: internal error, or issues accessing the database.

get.description: Returns information about the Vector Store service serving this API.
Returns the current operational status of the Vector Store node.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns the current operational status of the Vector Store node.

Distance.description: Distance between embedding vectors measured using the distance function defined while creating the index.

Embedding.description: The embedding vector to use for the Approximate Nearest Neighbor search. The format of data must match the quantization of the index.

ErrorMessage.description: A human-readable description of the error that occurred.

IndexInfo.description: Information about a vector index, such as keyspace, name and quantization.

IndexName.description: A name of the vector index in a db.

KeyspaceName.description: A keyspace name in a db.

propertyNames.description: Name of the column in a db table.

Quantization.description: Data type and precision used for storing and processing embedding vectors in the index.

Status.description: Operational status of the Vector Store node.
x-enum-descriptions: The node is establishing a connection to ScyllaDB.
The node is discovering available vector indexes in ScyllaDB.
The node is indexing embeddings into the discovered vector indexes.
The node has completed the initial database scan and built the indexes defined at that time. It is now monitoring the database for changes.
